titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for patient protection by establishing safe nurse staffing levels at certain Medicare providers, and for other purposes.
Safe Staffing for Nurse and Patient Safety Act of 2018
Safe Staffing for Nurse and Patient Safety Act of 2018
Safe Staffing for Nurse and Patient Safety Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
